abstract: Austan Goolsbee is leaving the Obama administration to return to his job teaching economics at the University of Chicago.
snippet: Austan Goolsbee is leaving the Obama administration to return to his job teaching economics at the University of Chicago.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Austan Goolsbee, a longtime adviser to President Obama and the only economist left on his core economic team, plans to leave as chairman of the Council of Economic Advisers by September, after a year in the job, to return to the University of Chicago.

headline.main: Top Obama Economic Player to Return to University Post
headline.print_headline: Top Obama Economic Player to Return to University Post

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: White House Council of Economic Advisers
